name: Custom made personalized ring pillow
description:
My custom made ring pillow will feature your choice of two (2) initials. 

The elegant flowing script monograms will be carefully hand embroidered in silk ribbon in a color of your choice. Each letter is embellished with exquisite little floral details in complementary colors. 

I embroider the initials onto white dupioni silk and add a length of ribbon tied into a small bow that you can attach your rings to.

The pillow will measure approximately 6” (15 cm) square and has soft fiberfill stuffing. It is the ideal size for little hands to carry.

At check out please indicate the following:

1. Your choice of two (2) initials. 

2. What color you would like the letters to be. If you have time before your wedding, I can work with you on your colors by mailing you ribbon samples.

name: bees necklace
description:
One little bee, busily working on the honeycomb, has been hand embroidered in black and yellow silk ribbon onto a vintage fabric. 
The honey colored fabric has been overlaid with vintage netting to represent the honeycomb.

I mounted the embroidery into a matte silver tone oval pendant frame that is 1 1/2” long x 1” wide. 

The pendant back is a silver tone finish and the necklace comes with a 22" snake chain or link chain, your choice.

The brooch frame measures approximately 2.4” (60mm) long x 1” (25mm) wide.

name: chartreuse necklace
description:
I hand dyed the white dupioni silk with a wonderful chartreuse sulfur color dye. The dye produced this abstract affect that looks like the horizon or a flow chart.

The fabric is mounted into a rectangular matte silver metal pendant frame that measures 1 ½” long x 1 3/16” wide (39cm x 30cm). The pendant comes complete with a 22” (56cm) silver snake chain or link chain (your choice) with a lobster claw clasp.

name: birch trees necklace
description:
The trees trunks are hand embroidered in different widths of white silk ribbon and given the signature birch bark markings using brown cotton embroidery floss. 

The original shown here has been sold, the necklace you purchase will be similar but not identical, that's the beauty of a true handmade item!

The design is stitched onto a wonderfully textured piece of natural colored burlap and set into an elegantly shaped matte silver oval metal frame. It measures 1 1/2” (3.8cm) long and 1” (2.5cm) wide and has a silver tone finish metal back plate.

The pendant is lead and nickel free. It comes complete with an 22” (56cm) silver-plated snake chain with a lobster clasp.

name: custom made lavender sachet
description:
This listing is for one (1) sachet. Custom hand embroidered initial in silk ribbon and embroidery floss in the color of your choice.

Each sachet is filled with soothing, fragrant lavender buds and measures approximately 4” x 4” (10cm x 10cm). 

I include a silk ribbon loop sewn into one corner so that it may be hung anywhere you like.

I will also add wonderful details to the initial in silk ribbon and embroidery floss in complementary colors. If there is a certain color combination you would like just let me know.

The initial will be in an uppercase script font. 
The sachet cover is available in silk dupioni fabric.
 
Please indicate your following choices of the following in the “message to seller”:
1. initial
2. color of initial

If you would like to order more than one sachet or would like two initials on one sachet contact me and I can make a custom listing for you.

I cannot ship this item to Australia. Australian Customs prohibits dried plant material from entering the country. I will be happy to send you an empty sachet. Please contact me so I can post a custom listing for you.
